Class Billing.Bill

java.lang.Object
hms.Billing.Billing.Bill
Enclosing class:
Billing
public class Billing.Bill extends Object
Represents an individual bill with details such as bill ID, patient ID, description, amount, and payment status.

  • Constructor Details

    • Bill

      public Bill(String id, String patientId, String description, double amount, boolean paid)
      Constructs a new Bill instance with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the bill.
      patientId - The patient ID associated with the bill.
      description - The description of the bill.
      amount - The total amount of the bill.
      paid - The payment status of the bill.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the bill in CSV format.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A CSV-formatted string of the bill.

    • viewBill

      public void viewBill(Billing.Bill bill)
      Displays the bill details in a formatted manner.
      Parameters:
      bill - The Bill object to be viewed.
